price: 34. No obstante, el Día de la Resurrección los creyentes se reirán de quienes rechazaron la verdad
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
